programme.title: Pure Design: Lindsay's Teenage Bedroom
programme.desc: Designer Samantha Pynn creates an eco-fabulous bedroom for 16-year-old Lindsay that perfectly balances youthful without looking childish - and still allows for room to grow.

programme.title: Pure Design: Carolyn & Derek's Attic Loft
programme.desc: Designer Samantha Pynn transforms an unimaginative third floor loft into a fun, colorful, bohemian-inspired family room that matches homeowners Carolyn and Derek's personalities.

programme.title: Pure Design: Ania & Walter's Master Bedroom
programme.desc: Too much space is not always a good thing, but with a little planning, designer Samantha Pynn is able to transform Ania and Walter's vast bedroom into a luxurious, earth-friendly boudoir.

programme.title: Pure Design: Liliana and Frank's Living/Dining Room
programme.desc: Frank and Liliana's 1930s home gets fast-forwarded to the 21st century as designer Samantha Pynn uses environmentally friendly furniture and fresh accessories to update the look of classic English Revival.

programme.title: Pure Design: Virginia's Kitchen
programme.desc: The cottage-style charm that Virginia fell in love with when she bought her city home has lost its appeal. Designer Samantha Pynn takes it from outdated to 'Modern Country' - with an eco-twist.

programme.title: Pure Design: Tiffany's Bedroom
programme.desc: For many first-time homeowners, decorating - especially private spaces like the bedroom - is definitely last on the list. That's certainly the case for Tiffany, an up and coming PR executive. By refreshing some of Tiffany's vintage furniture and bringing in some modern pieces and sustainable choices, host Samantha Pynn takes Tiffany's dorm-like bedroom with its mish-mash of furnishings and transforms it into an eclectic and soothing space, full of the sophistication a professional woman deserves.

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: Crooked Garden Gate
programme.desc: Building a garden gate for a space that's anything but square.

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: Cornhole Boards
programme.desc: My take on beginner-friendly cornhole boards.

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: Convertible Bench
programme.desc: This Convertible Bench is designed for versatility and style. Each section has two positions allowing for numerous configurations. It's a bench, a 2-seat bench, a table, a love seat, and even a chair with an end table, all in one piece of furniture!

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: Drill Charging Station
programme.desc: Back in 2010 I built a Drill Charging Station to show off a new joinery gadget. It was really simple and didn't quite have a feature set outside of being two shelves on the wall. So only eight short years later I finally decided to build a proper Drill Charging Station, made from Baltic Birch plywood featuring all the storage I need for 5 drills, two chargers, and all of my bits and accessories.

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: Drill Charging Station & DowelMax
programme.desc: I realized I needed a better way to store my drills and chargers. This simple wall-hanging “box” did the trick. I also wanted to make the project fast and easy, so I decided to try out the DowelMax for the first time. The system is a breeze to use and produces strong reliable joints in just a fraction of the time it takes to create a traditional mortise and tenon.

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: Drawbored Mortise & Tenon
programme.desc: The mortise and tenon is one of the strongest fundamental joints available to woodworkers, but there are a couple of ways we can make the joint even stronger and longer-lasting.

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: Dice Tower with Flocking Demo
programme.desc: A simple dice tower that randomizes your rolls and keeps the dice from falling off the table.

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: Dining Chair
programme.desc: You might recall the Gaming Dining Table I built in season 9. Ever since then, Nicole has been asking repeatedly, "When do I get my chairs?" So I started designing a new chair that I'd eventually batch out for a total of six. The video I've assembled here is a quick look at the process of designing and building the chair.

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: DIY Acoustic Panels
programme.desc: Simple DIY acoustic panels that pack a punch!

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: Domino Step Stool aka One Small Step
programme.desc: Marc teaches how to easily make an elegant domino step stool.

programme.title: Essence of India: Feasting on Art - Modern India Cooks!
programme.desc: We seek out outstanding chefs who emphasize new techniques in Indian food preparation, to the point that it becomes difficult to know where the art ends and the food begins.

programme.title: Essence of India: The Sweet Life
programme.desc: Indian’s dessert food may have taken a back seat to some of its popular main courses, but Samira finds out about the spectacular buffet of desserts on offer before making some in her own kitchen.

programme.title: Essence of India: You Are What You Eat - Detox The Indian Way
programme.desc: In this episode, between learning how to cook healthy, wholesome meals, we learn the true meaning of yoga in the birthplace of the ancient practice.

programme.title: Essence of India: The Curry Trail
programme.desc: Samira loves to make curries, Indian, South East Asian and the Western stew, but she heads back to India where she learns how to make some of India’s finest curries.

programme.title: Essence of India: Tandoori Party
programme.desc: The world loves to BBQ and India has some of the oldest forms – Tandoori cooking. Samira takes a fresh approach to Tandoori cuisine and the grill that goes back thousands of years.

programme.title: Essence of India: Coastal
programme.desc: In this episode we take a ride through some of the coastal states of India, we explore the creation of some spectacular seafood tapas, a special coastal dessert and some pink fizzy wine to end.

programme.title: Jewelry Stars by Sugar Gay Isber: Malachite Disk Pendant
programme.desc: Sugar Gay makes an amazing disk pendant out of malachite.

programme.title: Jewelry Stars by Sugar Gay Isber: Plaid Shark Tooth
programme.desc: Sugar Gay creates a colorful necklace out of a big shark tooth.

programme.title: Jewelry Stars by Sugar Gay Isber: Rainbow Crystal Pendant

programme.title: Jewelry Stars by Sugar Gay Isber: Star of David Suncatcher

programme.title: Jewelry Stars by Sugar Gay Isber: Ornament Earrings

programme.title: Jewelry Stars by Sugar Gay Isber: Cookie Tin

programme.title: Jewelry Stars by Sugar Gay Isber: Iced Ornaments

programme.title: Jewelry Stars by Sugar Gay Isber: Fancy Stones on Black
programme.desc: Sugar Gay makes a gorgeous necklace out of fancy shinning stones and a black chain.

programme.title: Jewelry Stars by Sugar Gay Isber: Opening Supplies
programme.desc: Time to open our new supplies! Join Sugar Gay in this new Jewelry Stars episode.

programme.title: Jewelry Stars by Sugar Gay Isber: Cookie Cutter Pendants
programme.desc: Sugar Gay makes a beautiful cookie cutter pendants.

programme.title: Jewelry Stars by Sugar Gay Isber: Banded Lace Agate Necklace
programme.desc: Sugar Gay makes a beautiful banded lace agate necklace.

programme.title: Jewelry Stars by Sugar Gay Isber: Beetle Wing Cuff
programme.desc: Sugar Gay makes a halloween theme crystal cuff with beautiful and colorful beads, stones and gems.

programme.title: Jewelry Stars by Sugar Gay Isber: Day Of The Dead Necklace
programme.desc: Sugar Gay makes a halloween theme necklace with beautiful and colorful beads, stones and gems.

programme.title: Jewelry Stars by Sugar Gay Isber: Snake Lariat
programme.desc: Sugar Gay makes a halloween theme necklace with beautiful and colorful beads, stones and gems

programme.title: Jewelry Stars by Sugar Gay Isber: Holiday Collar
programme.desc: Sugar Gay makes a holiday theme collar with beautiful and colorful beads, stones and gems.

programme.title: Jewelry Stars by Sugar Gay Isber: Holiday Earrings
programme.desc: Sugar Gay makes a holiday theme earrings with beautiful and colorful beads, stones and gems.
